sect1.title: Measure Tool
sect1.para: The Measure Tool is used to gain knowledge about pixel distances in your working image. By clicking and holding the mouse button, you can determine the angle and number of pixels between the point of click and where the mouse pointer is located. The information is displayed on the status bar or can also be displayed in the Info Window.

listitem.para: There is only one available option for the Measure Tool.
This option will display an Info Window dialog that details the measure tool results. The results are still available on the status bar.
